entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
